item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 6/26/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added a Human Agent option in number settings to automatically forward inbound calls to a live agent. Added a shortcut menu to quickly view “Sent” messages. Added detailed error messages when message delivery fails. Improved the alert message for failed WhatsApp delivery after 24 hours. Improved the outbound call flow. Fixed an issue where some users were occasionally unable to switch their current status.
